DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , fixed-sequence , single-center , 2 period study . The study design determine effect ketoconazole pharmacokinetics GDC-0980 .
DOC.brief_title: Study Determine Effect Ketoconazole Pharmacokinetics GDC-0980
